intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you do to stay healthy?
What is your favorite way to relax?

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to play outside?
respond_situations.description: You are talking to a friend.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You can choose coffee or tea.
You see a shirt in a shop. You want to ask the price.

ask_situations.instruction: You want to invite your friend to the park. ..
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.
You are at school. Ask a friend for help with homework.

listening_script.text: I wash the dishes. I use soap and water. The dishes are clean. I dry them with a towel. It is an easy job.

questions.question: When do you wash the dishes?
How do you wash the dishes?

follow_up_questions.question: What do you like about your English class?
When do you have English class?
Where is your English class held?
